core

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entire game world. (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Starting x-coordinate for the player.

      The speed the screen moves upward

      • solidAtPos

        public boolean solidAtPos(float x,
                 float y,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Checks if a position is solid, using image based collision, entire image is treated as a solid
        Parameters:
        x - The x position to test at
        y - The y position to test at
        width - The Width of the sprite
        height - The height of the sprite
        Returns:
        If a position is solid or not
